titleStmt.title: Two letters concerning the cure of the plague the one to Thomas Eliot Esq; on of the grooms of the bed chamber to His Majesty, the other the Mayor of the town of Southampton, both from Thomas O Dowd Esq, a licensed chymicall physician, and one of the grooms of the chamber to His Majesty King Charles.
titleStmt.author: O'Dowde, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
